document_data.name: Darthleene
document_data.mainbody: '''Darthleene''' was an [[archlich]] shopkeeper in [[Berdusk]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Darthleene managed the shop known as [[The Dawn of Any Day]], and helped adventurers by selling them [[magical item]]s.
document_data.History:
Once Darthleene was an adventurer herself, together with her lover the bard [[Tanalith Sorndarr]]. However, Tanalith died in battle and Darthleene mourned him for the rest of her days.

Later, she opened The Dawn of Any Day shop to provide magical wares to the [[Harpers]] as well as other adventurers.
document_data.Personality: Darthleene liked to hear tales of daring and see the vigor and sport of young folk. She never forgot anything and remembered the names of all her customers.
